mapper.update:
UPDATE so_modify_price
user_id = #{userId},
order_code = #{orderCode},
parent_order_code = #{parentOrderCode},
order_amount = #{orderAmount},
order_before_amount = #{orderBeforeAmount},
order_delivery_fee = #{orderDeliveryFee},
order_before_delivery_fee = #{orderBeforeDeliveryFee},
audit_status = #{auditStatus},
commit_user_id = #{commitUserId},
commit_user_name = #{commitUserName},
commit_time = #{commitTime},
audit_user_id = #{auditUserId},
audit_user_name = #{auditUserName},
audit_time = #{auditTime},
audit_reason = #{auditReason},
good_receiver_name = #{goodReceiverName},
good_receiver_mobile = #{goodReceiverMobile},
good_receiver_phone = #{goodReceiverPhone},
platform_id = #{platformId},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
